attributes.action: provide constructive feedback to those who submit petitions that are rejected.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Just telling us that this is not the appropriate forum to air our grievances without then giving us further advice appears somewhat remiss for an institution that has set up a forum with the apparent purpose of allowing us to air our grievances.

Tell us where we should go in order to find someone who will listen to us.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk. If you have a query about why your petition was rejected we suggest you read the terms and conditions. If it is still not clear, please write to the email address above.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
